last_episode_to_air.name: Memories To Cherish
last_episode_to_air.overview: Preparations are underway for the final session of Nam Gyu Man's trial.

name: Remember
overview: A genius lawyer, who suffers from Hyperthymetic syndrome, bets all in to save his father.

episodes.name: Murder Case Of The Seochon College Student
episodes.overview: Jin Woo's flawless memory is a sharp contrast to his father's failing memory. Jin Woo uses his memory to solve a crime his father is wrongly accused of. Lawyer Park makes a deal with the prosecutor to save his client.

episodes.name: Is This Enough To Prove My Dad's Innocence?
episodes.overview: Seo Jae Hyuk's case goes to court. His lawyer is incompetent and does not believe he is innocent. Attorney Park goes above and beyond to get his client released.

episodes.name: The Evidence Is Found
episodes.overview: Attorney Park learns that his case is connected to Jin Woo's father's case. Attorney Park gets under Nam Gyu Man's skin.

episodes.name: A Death Sentence
episodes.overview: We learn the truth about the night Oh Jung Ah was murdered. Chairman Nam Il Ho’s reach is far and his influence is great.

episodes.name: An Attorney, Seo Jin Woo
episodes.overview: Jin Woo has taken on Song Jae Ik as an apprentice. Nam Gyu Man is upset when the Vice President is given credit for the company's growth.

episodes.name: I Will Make You Stand Trial
episodes.overview: Lee In Ah tries to reconnect with Jin Woo after seeing him in court. Nam Gyu Man finds out that Jin Woo is preparing to appeal his father's conviction.

episodes.name: Nam Kyu Man's Trap
episodes.overview: Jin Woo gets something more valuable than a fee from the Vice President. He finds a witness who can back up his father's alibi, but then falls into Gyu Man's trap.

episodes.name: Saerim-dong
episodes.overview: Now Jin Woo must clear his own name before he can help his father. Attorney Park wants to help Jin Woo.

episodes.name: False Testimony
episodes.overview: A video surfaces that opens up Seo Jae Hyuk's case for retrial, but clearing his name will not be easy.

episodes.name: Dirty Hands, Dirty Money
episodes.overview: Disgusted by the corruption, In Ah leaves her job as a prosecutor. The retrial continues, but it might be too late for Seo Jae Hyuk.

episodes.name: Sin Is Crouching At Your Door
episodes.overview: Jin Woo refuses to back down and begins to exact his revenge. Detective Gwak digs his own grave.

episodes.name: Web Of Corruption
episodes.overview: Attorney Park starts to dig into Ilho Group's shady past. Allegiances are evaluated and changed.

episodes.name: The Truth Trumps Facts
episodes.overview: Gwak gives Jin Woo a gift. Nam Yeo Gyeong puts together some puzzle pieces. Jin Woo uses the Smile Bulb trial to expose Ilho Group.

episodes.name: Birds Of The Same Feather Flock Together
episodes.overview: In Ah finds out the secret that Jin Woo has been keeping. Jin Woo confronts Attorney Park about the car accident.

episodes.name: True Friends And Allegiances
episodes.overview: Nam Gyu Man admits the truth to his sister. Prosecutor Tak may not be as trustworthy as Jin Woo and In Ah think, but they find other allies.

episodes.name: The True Fist Of The Law
episodes.overview: It looks like Nam Gyu Man's world is starting to fall apart, but his father pulls some more strings. Jin Woo finally gets to see Nam Gyu Man stand trial.

episodes.name: Park Dong Ho Gets Framed
episodes.overview: Sang Ho begs Jin Woo to take on Attorney Park's case. Judge Kang makes a move that surprises Jin Woo and In Ah.

episodes.name: Who Is Truly On Your Side?
episodes.overview: Jin Woo goes after the real criminal in order to get Attorney Park acquitted and files another request for a retrial for his father's case.

episodes.name: The Retrial
episodes.overview: Jin Woo and his friends work to solidify their case for the retrial. Nam Gyu Man and Attorney Hong work on a plan to keep Nam Gyu Man out of jail.

episodes.name: Memories To Cherish
episodes.overview: Preparations are underway for the final session of Nam Gyu Man's trial.
